short_description: Metal Cutting Saw – Equipped with a 15 Amp motor and a lightweight pressed steel base, the S355CPSL is designed for portability. The integrated chip deflector directs debris away from the operator for easier cleanup.

Dry-Cut Technology for Cool, Burr-Free Cuts – Featuring a premium tungsten carbide-tipped blade, this chop saw cuts mild steel efficiently with minimal heat and sparks, leaving a smooth, instantly workable finish. Ideal for professional, clean metal cuts.

Adjustable Miter Saw with 0-45° Angle Cuts – Easily make precise angled cuts with the cast steel vise and fence. The quick-release mechanism securely clamps workpieces for fast, accurate results, enhancing cutting precision.

Versatile Blades for Multiple Materials – Optimize your cuts with Evolution’s range of saw blades, including options for mild steel, thin steel, aluminum, and stainless steel, tailored for high-volume and continuous use.

3-Year Warranty & US-Based Support – Built to last, this heavy-duty metal cutting saw is backed by a 3-year warranty and reliable US-based customer service, ensuring peace of mind with every purchase.

name: Evolution S185CCSL | 7.25” Metal Cutting Circular Saw | Cuts Steel & More | 7-1/4” TCT Blade Included | 45° Bevel Cuts | Dry-Cut | 15A Corded Power | Accurate, Powerful, Reliable
short_description: Powerful 15 Amp Motor for Heavy-Duty Cutting: Tackle tough steel fabrication jobs with ease—this 7-1/4" metal cutting circular saw is powered by a high-performance 15 amp motor for fast, clean, and cool-to-the-touch cuts in mild steel.

Lightweight Design for All-Day Use: Weighing just 11.4 lbs, the S185CCSL is one of the lightest circular saws in its class—ideal for repetitive tasks, overhead work, and maximum jobsite productivity without fatigue.

Clean, Burr-Free Finishes with TCT Blade: Equipped with a 40-tooth TCT blade, this saw delivers smooth, spark-free cuts with virtually no heat or burrs—resulting in instantly workable edges for welding or fabrication.

Adjustable Bevel and Depth Settings: Make precise cuts every time with paddle levers that allow quick 0–45° bevel adjustments and up to 2-1/2" cutting depth—perfect for metal roofing, framing, and angled cuts.

Clear Cutline Visibility & Airflow Management: A built-in blade viewing window and channeled airflow keep your cutline clean and visible—helping ensure accurate, safe, and controlled cutting on every pass.

name: KAKA INDUSTRIAL Metal Band Saw,10-Inch x 7.9-Inch Band Saw 45°/60°/90° Miter Cutting,1.5HP Motor 115V/230V, Worm Gear Drive & Dual Coolant System for Steel, Aluminum, Pipe Fabrication BS-108G
short_description: EXTENDED 45°/60°/90° MITER CUTTING RANGE​ The KAKA INDUSTRIAL BS-108G Horizontal Band Saw​ features a patented gear-driven saw bow that rotates through a wide 0° to 60° range, with positive stops at the most commonly used 45° and 90° positions for quick setup. This exceptional flexibility, guided by a clear engraved scale, is ideal for creating precise bevel cuts on pipe fittings, structural frames, and complex fabrications, significantly expanding your project capabilities beyond standard straight cuts .

INDUSTRIAL WORM GEAR DRIVE FOR HEAVY-DUTY PERFORMANCE​ Engineered for durability, the cast-iron worm gear transmission is built to withstand over 3,000 hours of continuous operation, even when cutting tough materials like stainless steel beams. The 50% thicker housing compared to standard bandsaws prevents gear slippage, ensuring consistent power delivery and clean cuts through solid bar stock up to 4 inches, providing reliable performance in demanding workshop environments .

DUAL-COOLANT SYSTEM & AUTO SHUTOFF FOR EFFICIENCY AND SAFETY​ An integrated flood coolant combined with a mist lubrication system works to reduce blade temperature by approximately 50°F, effectively doubling blade life and improving cut quality on both steel and aluminum. The automatic safety shutoff immediately cuts power if the rear guard is opened during operation, while the adjustable hydraulic downfeed ensures consistent cutting pressure and automatic stopping at the end of a cut .

RAPID-ADJUST VISE AND SPACE-SAVER DESIGN​ The quick-release vise with laser-etched rulers allows for one-handed positioning and locking in seconds. This is especially useful for securely holding irregular shapes like I-beams. Its universal 115V/230V motor offers flexibility for use with standard outlets or generator power on construction sites .

HIGH-CAPACITY PRECISION CUTTING​ This bandsaw delivers a robust 10-inch x 7.9-inch (254mm x 200mm) rectangular cutting capacity and a 9-inch (228mm) round capacity at 90°. Powered by a 1.5HP motor, it efficiently handles carbon steel, alloy steel, aluminum, and other non-ferrous metals. The combination of hydraulic feed control and adjustable blade guides ensures straight, accurate, and burr-free cuts, making it a versatile tool for professional metalworking shops, fabrication, maintenance, and serious DIY projects .

product_description: Product Description The DW872 14-inch Multi-Cutter Chop Saw for Metal Cutting cuts a wide variety material at a constant depth throughout blade life. The cut off saw cuts four times faster than chop saws. From the Manufacturer The DW872 multicutter saw is a dry cutting saw that uses a carbide-tipped blade specifically designed for cutting heavy-duty metals. This 14-inch saw has enough capacity to cut everything from 5-inch black pipe to 2-9/16-inch solid bar stock. It's also great for cutting threaded rod, struts, angle iron, black pipe, and rebar. The DW872 cuts at incredibly good speeds. Not only is the speed impressive, but with the finished surface, there is little need for touchup, reducing grinding and filling times. The carbide-tipped blade averages more than 1,200 cuts in most applications, and by sharpening, you can get up to 5,000 cuts. Most local blade shops will retarget the blade. The DW872 sports a powerful 15 amp, 5.3-horsepower motor and is designed to stand up to rugged work on a regular basis. Your purchase includes a quick-locking vise and tool-free miter adjustment for additional speed and convenience. Features Multicutter offers versatility by cutting a wide variety of materials, including ferrous and nonferrous metals Utilizing a carbide-tipped blade as opposed to an abrasive wheel, the depth of cut remains constant throughout blade life, eliminating the need for frequent wheel changes associated with abrasive wheel cutting Multicutter cuts 4 times faster than chop saws and 8 times faster than portable band saws in 2-by-2-by-1/4-inch angle iron 14-inch, 70-tooth carbide-tipped blade delivers a lower cost per cut compared to abrasive wheels, with savings of up to 5 cents per cut versus abrasive cutting Specially designed carbide teeth deliver fast, precise, virtually burr-free cuts, saving time and money over abrasive wheels by reducing the need for preparation grinding. This ensures a cleaner work environment free from abrasive dust ingestion and finished cuts that are cool to the touch Largest capacity in its class, with even more capacity than a deep-cut portable band saw (5-3/16 inches round and 4-1/2 by 6-1/2 inches rectangular), allowing user to cut a wider variety of variable-size materials for more applications Ergonomically designed horizontal handle puts user's wrist in a more comfortable position to help reduce fatigue and increase productivity 15 amp, 4-horsepower motor provides more overload capacity to increase performance and durability Patented tool-free, 45-degree adjustable fence delivers fast and accurate angle cuts without the hassle of using a wrench Quick-lock vise allows for fast clamping on variable-size materials to increase productivity Extra-wide solid steel base provides increased stability when cutting longer material. The 4 predrilled holes in the base allow easy bolt down to any work bench. The solid steel base also allows users to weld jigs or stops directly to the base Durable metal top handle allows the user to carry the saw easily Heavy-duty lockdown pin allows the user to lock the head of the saw in the carrying position without the use of a chain Onboard wheel-change wrench allows for convenient storage and greatly reduces the risk of lost wrenches Spindle lock allows users to make wheel changes fast and easy, saving time and money Adjustable chip deflector allows user to channel chips away from hazardous materials and co-workers Easily accessible brushes allow for convenient servicing on the worksite to minimize downtime Heavy-duty compression spring provides smooth movement and greater durability than torsion springs Quick-retracting guard allows user to see the line of cut while protecting against chips Vertical clamp provides the user with the most efficient clamping system in the industry Specifications Amps: 15 AC/DC amps Horsepower: 4 hp No-load speed: 1,300 rpm Spindle lock: yes Quick-lock vise: yes Wheel arbor: 1 inch Wheel diameter: 14 inches Max capacity (round): 5-3/16 inches Max capacity (rectangular): 6-1/2 by 4-1/2 inches Tool length: 21 inches Tool weight: 47 lbs. Includes 14-inch carbide-tipped blade Wrench Vertical clamp Warranty This DeWalt high-performance industrial tool comes with a warranty package that includes: 30-day, no-risk satisfaction guarantee One-year free service contract One-year warranty
